bibl.title: Order from Ptolemaios to Nechoutes.
bibl.note: Ptolemaios, the strategos of the Arsinoite nome, writes an order to Nechoutes, the basilikos grammateus, to measure out kleroi for three men designated Thracians, 4 December 180 B.C.E.

bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.seg: OATES John F., Order from Ptolemaios to Nechoutes.
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 77-79.
Ptolemaios, the strategos of the Arsinoite nome, writes an order to Nechoutes, the basilikos grammateus, to measure out kleroi for three men designated Thracians, 4 December 180 B.C.E.
